REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to permitting retired members to authorize a deduction from retirement benefits for membership dues in the Retired Public Employees Association, Inc.
Summary: Relates to permitting retired members to authorize a deduction from retirement benefits for membership dues in the Retired Public Employees Association, Inc.
LawCode: Amd ยง110-c, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to deductions for retiree organization dues
